name: Diner
subtitle: elevated pet feeder
description: Dine in style!  Our modern pet feeder comes in three sizes and six colors that add simple, lively style to both your pet’s dining area and your overall décor.

details.title: Features
content: Handcrafted with Walnut Hardwood veneer Euro Ply
Comes in three sizes and six colors

details.title: Specifications
content: Single 6 ½"W x 7 ½"L x 4 ½"H
Triple 6 ½"W x 22 ½"L x 4 ½"H

details.title: Shipping
content: Items ship free, fully assembled (Continental US only)
For international shipping rates, please contact me for a quote
